# Cross-Chain Smart Contracts

import DocCardList from "@theme/DocCardList";

This section will walk you through how to get set up to write cross-chain smart contracts on Stellar, plus an introduction to testing, storing data, and deploying your contracts. It also provides an array of example contracts for use.
